overview.en: The vision of MTM (Metatron) is to construct the first chain in the global game public chain. It is the basic passport in the whole Metatron ecosystem. MTM can not only circulate, consume, exchange rights and interests, and commercialize in the Singularity public chain game, but also interact in the whole Metatron community to realize the cross-ecological circulation of POS_OCPC consensus mechanism.
overview.zh: MTM（Metatron）的愿景是构建全球游戏公链有链中的第一链，它是整个Metatron生态中的基础通行证，MTM不但可以在Singularity公链游戏中进行流通、消耗、权益兑换、商业化投放等诸多环节还可在整个Metatron社区中进行价值交互，从而实现POS_OCPC共识机制的跨生态流通。
